attributes.action: Stop bullying, harassement and hate crime in the workplace
attributes.additional_details: Victims voice is often lost. There is a general disbelief and isolation when victim raises the concerns through in house grievance processes. Hence, victim needs to be helped through the government, parliament and petition. So, that it benefits UK economy and the victim both.
attributes.background: Bullying, harassement and hate crime costs UK economy loss of monies. It adversely impacts victims career, health and personal life.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to tackle bullying, harrassment and hate crime in the workplace.
